creditline: Anonymous gift in memory of John L. and Ruth M. McKelvey
description: One of a pair of bowls decorated with sea waves and auspicious animals; white ground with blue design; white interior with two thin blue lines around rim and a circle containing waves and a winged elephant on the bottom; exterior has a scene of 9 unique animals amongst waves; a band along the rim with two thing blue lines and groups of three round swirls; elephant has a white and blue eye
title: Bowl decorated with sea waves and auspicious animals, one of a pair
